column4: does anybody know if the iPod will play XviD files with Lame\MP3 audio?
I have played around with pornview but xnview is better
can anyone help me with ffmpeg
i am having problems converting an ogm file can anyone help me
vlc, and mplayer play to ogm fine and I have a newly compiled ffmpeg with extra codec support
the ogm is in theroa-vorbis format and I want ffmpeg to convert it to a xvid-lame
does it play with gstreamer apps (e.g. totem)?
if you can find a gstreamer transcoding tool that will work
do you know the name of one?
afraid not. if you ask on #gstreamer someone might be able to help you
